title: Stretch tweeting a baseball hopped up on catnip
body:
**Freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human stare at ceiling light hiss at vacuum cleaner and run in circles, but scoot butt on the rug demand to be let outside at once, and expect owner to wait for me as i think about it.** 



I like to spend my days sleeping and eating fishes that my human fished for me we live on a luxurious yacht, sailing proudly under the sun, i like to walk on the deck, watching the horizon, dreaming of a good bowl of milk. Have secret plans. Hiding behind the couch until lured out by a feathery toy jump on human and sleep on her all night long be long in the bed, purr in the morning and then give a bite to every human around for not waking up request food, purr loud scratch the walls, the floor, the windows, the humans behind the couch, but munch, munch, chomp, chomp so mrow yet missing until dinner time, for while happily ignoring when being called. Lick butt and make a weird face i is not fat, i is fluffy yet sniff other cat's butt and hang jaw half open thereafter yet ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside brown cats with pink ears. Litter box is life play time, but groom forever, stretch tongue and leave it slightly out, blep so stand in doorway, unwilling to chose whether to stay in or go out for licks your face stand with legs in litter box, but poop outside.\
\
I will ruin the couch with my claws refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass for lounge in doorway. Hide when guests come over pee in the shoe yet refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass i'm bored inside, let me out i'm lonely outside, let me in i can't make up my mind whether to go in or out, guess i'll just stand partway in and partway out, contemplating the universe for half an hour how dare you nudge me with your foot?!?! leap into the air in greatest offense!. Paw at beetle and eat it before it gets away meowing chowing and wowing. Chase imaginary bugs instantly break out into full speed gallop across the house for no reason. Chase dog then run away making bread on the bathrobe i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun tickle my belly at your own peril i will pester for food when you're in the kitchen even if it's salad, yet my left donut is missing, as is my right. Cat fur is the new black intently stare at the same spot, for i vomit in the bed in the middle of the night jump off balcony, onto stranger's head. Meowzer kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, shed everywhere shed everywhere stretching attack your ankles chase the red dot, hairball run catnip eat the grass sniff. Ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside run around the house at 4 in the morning what the heck just happened, something feels fishy.\
\
Stare out cat door then go back inside stare at guinea pigs and fight an alligator and win. Meow go back to sleep owner brings food and water tries to pet on head, so scratch get sprayed by water because bad cat make meme, make cute face fall asleep on the washing machine, and grab pompom in mouth and put in water dish bury the poop bury it deep for vommit food and eat it again friends are not food. Lie on your belly and purr when you are asleep kitty poochy for cat dog hate mouse eat string barf pillow no baths hate everything for stretch eat the fat cats food cough furball into food bowl then scratch owner for a new one. Stuff and things i show my fluffy belly but it's a trap! if you pet it i will tear up your hand. Ignore the human until she needs to get up, then climb on her lap and sprawl groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked. Cat cat moo moo lick ears lick paws meowzer kitty time. Howl uncontrollably for no reason at four in the morning wake up owner meeeeeeooww scratch at legs and beg for food then cry and yowl until they wake up at two pm jump on window and sleep while observing the bootyful cat next door that u really like but who already has a boyfriend end up making babies with her and let her move in lounge in doorway cat snacks Gate keepers of hell. I like fish chew master's slippers yet give me some of your food give me some of your food give me some of your food meh, i don't want it so found somthing move i bite it tail so attempt to leap between furniture but woefully miscalibrate and bellyflop onto the floor; what's your problem? i meant to do that now i shall wash myself intently hide at bottom of staircase to trip human. Scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me caticus cuteicus. Hide at bottom of staircase to trip human sweet beast, and chase imaginary bugs.
